subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brandon Phillips drove in three runs and Adam Dunn hit his 39th home run of the season last night to lead the Cincinnati Reds to a 6-5 victory against Milwaukee in another setback for the Brewers’ postseason hopes. It was the Reds’ fourth consecutive victory.
